Rampage 1 [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)[/i]
Whenever a wounded creature dealt damage this turn by Gnoll Fang of Yeenoghu dies, untap Gnoll Fang of Yeenoghu. This ability triggers only once each turn.
[i]Demonic Bite[/i] – {1}{R}, {T}: Gnoll Fang of Yeenoghu fights target creature you don’t control.
